name: Blastenheimer 5000 Ultra Cannon
rules: Ongoing: 3, [Exhaust] -> You may put an ally card from your hand into play. If you do, destroy it at the start of the next turn.

name: Sayge
rules: At the start of your turn, remove the top card of target opponent's deck from the game. If it's an ability, ally, or equipment card, you may play it this game. (Pay costs as normal.)

name: Silas Darkmoon
rules: Silas has ATK equal to the combined ATK of all other allies in your party, and health equal to the combined health of all other allies in your party.

name: Darkmoon Card: Madness
rules: On your turn: 2, [Exhaust] -> Remove the top card of target opponent's deck from the game. If it's an ability, ally, or equipment card, he destroys a card of that kind he controls.

name: The Darkmoon Faire
rules: 1, [Exhaust], Discard a card -> Draw a card.; At the start of your turn, if you control cards in play with costs 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8, you win the game.
